7 Travis Turney

Position OF

B/T L/R

Class Junior

Hometown Fresno, Calif.

Highschool Clovis West HS

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2019: Started 10 games and made 23 appearances… recorded seven hits, a double, a triple, a home run, four RBI’s, and six runs scored… 2-for-2 on stolen bases… finished the year going 2-for-4 with a homer and two RBI’s at Pacific (May 17).

2018: 24 appearances and eight starts during freshman campaign… five hits, two doubles, an RBI, and two runs scored… first collegiate hit was a double, and he’d eventually score, during home win over Saint Joseph’s… had two hits and an RBI against UC Irvine (Mar. 10).

CLOVIS WEST HS: Three-year letter winner for the Golden Eagles… named the Offensive MVP at the 2017 Fresno City-County All-Star Game after leading off the contest with a solo home run to right field; he’d add a triple in his next at-bat, becoming the first player ever to hit a homer and a triple during the showcase… as a senior, he received California Region Honorable Mention accolades by Perfect Game, and he was selected to the Tri-River Conference DI First Team… was also named the Clovis West Most Outstanding Offensive Player, and Perfect Game previously named him Underclass Honorable Mention in 2015 and 2016… he led the Golden Eagles in batting average (.384), hits (22), steals (7) and on-base percentage (.489)… also lettered in basketball… baseball and basketball scholar athlete.

PERSONAL: Born on April 16, 1999 in Sacramento, Calif.… parents are Rhonda and Keith Turney… major is marketing... minor is fina arts... mother Rhonda ran track at Fresno State and Sacramento City College; brother Tyler played baseball at Jackson State and Fresno City College.
